duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide general direction, coordination, and supervision of all aspects of the operational and front-end financial operations of the clinic.
Directly manage all clinic non-provider staff.
Market clinic services and network with local providers and referral sources to assist in facilitating practice growth.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website for maximum engagement and conversions.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of clinic operations and marketing efforts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or a health-related field required. Minimum of 4 years of experience managing a medical practice and an associate's degree may substitute for the bachelor's degree requirement.
Knowledge of Epic software system preferred.
